amendment.description: An amendment to reduce funding for the Abandoned Mine Reclamation Fund by $29,904,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Abandoned Mine Reclamation Fund by $29,904,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Yoho amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Yoho.
